pr_title: DB-10854 Fix txn leak in FROM FINAL TABLE.

timeline.message: DB-10854 Fix txn leak in FROM FINAL TABLE.

timeline.bodyText: Can you rename BoundAndOptimizedStatement in all places to firstLowerCase?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

timeline.bodyText: I think a try-with-resources would be better, in case we raise an exception for instance.
timeline.author: dgomezferro
dgomezferro

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this always be 0, since the test is Serial?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: Theoretically.  But the user may be doing something else on the machine.  If they have another running operation in a user session I don't want it to raise a false alarm in this test.
replies.author: msirek
